message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product, and I think you'd really appreciate it.  I'm asking for $120, which is a great deal considering its value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $100 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $100 simply doesn't cover my costs. I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value of the product.
Alice, thank you for your offer. Considering the value of the product, I am still interested in purchasing it for $100.
